predicate.note: Frames file for 'overuse' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: use too much

example.name: passive
example.text: Editorials in the Greenville newspaper allowed that Mrs. Yeargin was wrong, but also said the case showed how testing was being overused *trace*.

roleset.note: This example feels more adjectival to me, but hey, that's life.
